New Records: 165 runs as the best opening wicket stand in T20Is for India
Key Match Events: Shubman Gill and Yashasvi Jaiswal made 165 runs together
India chased down 179 with 3 overs to spare
Post-Match Reflections: India leveled the series 2-2 with this win
The fifth T20I will be played on Sunday
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pitch stayed true for the entire match
Shimron Hetmyer scored 61 for West Indies
Arshdeep Singh took 3 wickets for 38 runs
